first_para: Dr (David) Hywel Francis (born 6 June 1946) is a Welsh Labour Party politician, who was the Member of Parliament (MP) for Aberavon from 2001 to 2015.

full.extract:
Dr (David) Hywel Francis (born 6 June 1946) is a Welsh Labour Party politician, who was the Member of Parliament (MP) for Aberavon from 2001 to 2015.
^ http://www.publications.parliament.uk/pa/cm/cmregmem/110124/part2.htm

full.title: Hywel Francis
